query.name: findByPK
query.sql: SELECT * FROM CRF WHERE CRF_ID = ?

query.name: findByItemOid
query.sql: select distinct(crf.*) from crf,item_form_metadata ifm,crf_version cv,item i where ifm.item_id = i.item_id and ifm.crf_version_id = cv.crf_version_id and cv.crf_id = crf.crf_id and i.oc_oid = ?

query.name: findByOID
query.sql: SELECT * FROM CRF WHERE OC_OID = ?

query.name: findByName
query.sql: SELECT * FROM CRF WHERE name = ?

query.name: findAnotherByName
query.sql: SELECT * FROM CRF WHERE name = ? and crf_id !=?

query.name: findAll
query.sql: SELECT * FROM CRF

query.name: findAllByStudy
query.sql: SELECT * FROM CRF WHERE source_study_id=?

query.name: findAllByStatus
query.sql: SELECT * FROM CRF where status_id=?

query.name: findAllByLimit
query.sql: SELECT * FROM CRF limit 5

query.name: create
query.sql: INSERT INTO CRF (STATUS_ID,NAME, DESCRIPTION, OWNER_ID, DATE_CREATED,OC_OID,SOURCE_STUDY_ID) VALUES (?,?,?,?,NOW(),?,?)

query.name: update
query.sql: UPDATE CRF SET STATUS_ID=?,NAME=?, DESCRIPTION=?,DATE_UPDATED=NOW(),UPDATE_ID=? WHERE CRF_ID=?

query.name: findVersionNamesForCRF
query.sql: select name, description from crf_version where crf_id=?

query.name: findItemNames
query.sql: SELECT name FROM item

query.name: findItemNamesByCRF
query.sql: select distinct i.name from item i, item_form_metadata ifm,crf_version c where i.item_id= ifm.item_id and ifm.crf_version_id=c.crf_version_id and c.crf_id=?

query.name: findItemGroupNamesByCRF
query.sql: select name from item_group where crf_id=?

query.name: findDefaultVersion
query.sql: select default_version_id from event_definition_crf where crf_id =?

query.name: updateDefaultVersion
query.sql: update event_definition_crf set default_version_id = (select crf_version_id from crf_version where crf_id = ?) where crf_id = ?

query.name: findByVersionId
query.sql: SELECT DISTINCT c.* FROM crf c, crf_version v WHERE c.crf_id=v.crf_id AND v.crf_version_id=?

query.name: findByLayoutId
query.sql: SELECT DISTINCT c.* FROM crf c, form_layout v WHERE c.crf_id=v.crf_id AND v.form_layout_id=?

query.name: findAllByStudyId
query.sql: SELECT DISTINCT c.* FROM crf c, crf_version v WHERE c.crf_id=v.crf_id AND v.crf_version_id=?

query.name: findAllActiveByDefinition
query.sql: select distinct c.* from crf c,event_definition_crf edc where edc.study_event_definition_id=? and c.crf_id=edc.crf_id and c.status_id=1 and edc.status_id=1

query.name: findAllActiveByDefinitions
query.sql: select distinct c.* from crf c,event_definition_crf edc where edc.study_id=? and c.crf_id=edc.crf_id and c.status_id=1 and edc.status_id=1 and (c.source_study_id !=? or c.source_study_id is null)

query.name: getCountofCRFs
query.sql: select count(crf.crf_id) from crf where crf.status_id != 5

query.name: buildCrfById
query.sql: select * from crf where crf_id in (select crf_id from event_definition_crf where study_event_definition_id in ( select study_event_definition_id from study_event_definition where study_event_definition_id in ( select distinct study_event_definition_id from study_event where study_subject_id = ?)))
